input.sentences: i had a great time at the interview yesterday .
there were a lot of people there .
we had a lot of people to interview .
when we were done i went home and slept .
output.sentences: Yesterday it was time for an interview.
Many people joined the lot to start.
Several people within the lot tried to film the interview.
It took several hours in total.
They were glad they slept well at the hotel being so far from home.
